directions.text: In a plastic container put salt, sugar, peppercorns, and mustard powder.
Heat up vinegar in microwave for a min then add to container, swirl and sit for 7 mins.
Add 1 pound ice cubes, shake, add chops and refrigerate for 2 hours.
Mix rest of ingredients in a bowl, chopping or crumbling everything into small bits.
Cut horizontal pockets into chops, make pocket big but hole small.
Fill each chop with cornbread mixture.
Grill them on medium high heat for 6 mins per side, turning after 3 minutes.
